mapper.select: SELECT t.*, if(ISNULL(u.id), 0, 1) master, su.account from sso_tenant t left join sso_user u on t.user_id = u.id INNER JOIN sso_org o on t.id = o.tenant_id INNER JOIN sso_org_user ou on ou.org_id = o.id and ou.user_id = #{userId} INNER JOIN sso_user su ON su.id = ou.user_id order by master desc
